comments.body: this is never used directly, so I can't think of why this shouldn't be a trait. It would break compatibility at this point, but since it's experimental it may be permissible?
comments.diffHunk:

  */
 @Experimental
-class ClusteringSummary private[clustering] (
-    @transient val predictions: DataFrame,
-    val predictionCol: String,
-    val featuresCol: String,
-    val k: Int) extends Serializable {
+// TODO: make this a trait?
